html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02602023-03-23IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Examination of Eligibility to Refer a Claim)
PrecisRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Examination of Eligibility to Refer a Claim) in order to (1) expand the application of the Safe Third Country Agreement (STCA) restrictions to include anyone who enters in between Point of Entries along the Canada-U.S. land border and makes a claim for asylum within 14 days; (2) clarify the definition of stateless person; and (3) clarify the authority of immigration officers to allow re-determination of claims for individuals deemed ineligible to enter Canada, but refused re-entry by the U.S.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Examination of Eligibility to Refer a Claim)
precis: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Examination of Eligibility to Refer a Claim) in order to (1) expand the application of the Safe Third Country Agreement (STCA) restrictions to include anyone who enters in between Point of Entries along the Canada-U.S. land border and makes a claim for asylum within 14 days; (2) clarify the definition of stateless person; and (3) clarify the authority of immigration officers to allow re-determination of claims for individuals deemed ineligible to enter Canada, but refused re-entry by the U.S.
